title: Looking for low-grade Scoops Carey and Woodie Thornton
author: Beansballcardblog

posts.post_title: Looking for low-grade Scoops Carey and Woodie Thornton
posts.post_content:
I just recently found out that these two gentlemen in the T206 set played baseball at my alma mater.  If anybody has low-grade copies they'd like to move, let me know.  I am completely fine with cards in the shape of the ones below.  I'd just like to add them to my collection.  

Thanks!
-Kin


[url=https://flic.kr/p/LXBUxZ][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/9/8437/29509110775_860c227c5e_m.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/LXBUxZ]img528[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/24579302@N08/]kekinsley[/url], on Flickr
